title.narrative: EDUCATION QUALITY

description.narrative: The Quality of Primary Education is improved nation wide, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Access and Quality Education to girls and Boys, and National Policies for Early Child Development and Literacy in support of Education for the MDG.
